name: Natalie Brooks: The Treasures of Lost Kingdom
name_original: Natalie Brooks: The Treasures of Lost Kingdom
description:
Natalie Brooks: The Treasures of Lost Kingdom is a casual adventure game developed by Alawar Entertainment. It came out on 19-12-2008. It was published by Alawar Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Natalie Brooks: The Treasures of Lost Kingdom is available on iOS and PC.
